_header: Forsake your sin that done amiss
_description: A couplet (based on Ephesians III) used as heading to Latin sermon

CamGon230.Transcription:
fforsake youre synne þat doon a mysAnd sue þe weye þat
                    ledeth to blis
CamGon230.Note:
MS also paginated and this p. 181; couplet used as heading to sermon,
                    ‘Ambulate’ ad Eph. iiio.
